content:
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/compiler/rustc_error_codes/src/error_codes/E0001.md

Note: this error code is no longer emitted by the compiler.

Then why is it still there?
maybe so it can still be found on the web page if it's emitted by an older version of the compiler?
Yeah, I believe that is the reason old error codes are kept.
i also think the rendered explanations at https://doc.rust-lang.org/error-index.html aren't easy enough to discover, but that's a set of related issues
